data.what_is:
Marketing Creatio is a robust marketing automation software that helps to gain demand generation excellence by identifying customers' needs and nurturing their interests until they are successfully transformed into opportunities.
Creatio has been included in the 2020 Gartner Magic Quadrant for CRM Lead Management based on its completeness of vision and ability to execute.

*	Easily manage each step of customer demand generation by following pre-defined processes - from lead qualification to hand-off to sales.
*	Use bpm'online analytics to track new leads, evaluate the level of engagement and efficiency of different channels.
*	Use bpm'online marketing to build your target audience and send bulk emails with just a few clicks of a mouse.

Creatio has been widely recognized by key industry analysts, including Gartner, Forrester, Nucleus Research, Ovum, ISM and received multiple prestigious awards.
The solution listed in Five Categories of The Gartner CRM Vendor Guide 2016.
data.product_description: A holistic multichannel marketing management software powered by out-of-the-box best practice processes delivering demand generation excellence.
data.supported_languages: Arabic, Czech, German, English, Persian, French, Hebrew, Italian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Ukrainian

pricing_plans.plan_description: Multichannel marketing software to deliver demand generation excellence

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Creatio?
Marketing for Creatio, just like the Sales module allows for easy customisation of workflows and goals.
It's great for email campaigns and website events. I haven't as yet used the full functionality of the marketing module.
The Support Team and Customer Representatives are very helpful and knowledgeable (especially Anna Lynne).

What do you dislike about Marketing Creatio?
I haven't used a marketing platform such as Creatio in the past, so it has been quite a steep learning curve for me.
Pricing is based on "Campaign participants" within the last 12months on top of the regular licensing fee.

What problems is Marketing Creatio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tracking email performance and reach, using the in-built functionality. Including A/B testing.
There are many ways to segment contacts and customers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Creatio?
Bpm online marketing has given us great visibility of our customers while at the same time making our products conspicuous. Bpm comes with a personal touch of communication since we can build and personalise bulk email and relay the conveyance of the same. automated emailing service have really helped us and also delivery and tracking of information on a customer

What do you dislike about Marketing Creatio?
The support from the help desk has reduced any dislike due to their coming in handy at the onset of any problem

Recommendations to others considering Marketing Creatio:
Have yourself the best software in lead sales. Bpm is relatively cheap and affordable suited to improve the  way your organisation attracts and engages  your customers

What problems is Marketing Creatio solving and how is that benefiting you?
The lead platform is working to help us check online activities and tap into our potential customers. Bpm has helped us to nurture and build a strong online presence.lead has helped us in making great conversions hence increasing our customer interactions and sales. SEO has helped us in knowing where to look for our customers.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent tool for business process automation and a handy tool for CRM
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Creatio?
There are many things to like in this application. It is practically all in one software for all your business needs. Very fast to learn and in a short period of time you will be able to start handling your customers and a staff can work in a more efficient way.

What do you dislike about Marketing Creatio?
BPMonline needs to have more customization for different types of industries.

Recommendations to others considering Marketing Creatio:
Just go for it. Take a trial, learn it and then buy

What problems is Marketing Creatio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Its easier to organize customer data, better plan activities and analyze them. Campaigning is better now and information can be used in a more effective way.
